law.catch_line: Procedure for technical correction on face of bill to be presented to Governor.
law.text: When the House or Senate clerk or a member of his staff makes a change or correction on the face of the bill to be presented to the Governor for his approval or other action, he shall deliver a copy of the bill containing the change to the statute reviser and shall affix his signature and the date of making the change on the face of the original bill and the copy sent to the statute reviser in a position near the changed material. Any change not so indicated and signed shall be null and void and shall not be placed in the statutes by the statute reviser.
law.history: Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 2, sec. 7, effective February 5, 1982.
